wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Baird MBE (née Innes, born 14 March 1974) is a former athlete who represented Great Britain at three Paralympic Games. During her career she was recognised as the greatest sprinter in her class, winning four Paralympic gold medals along with two World Championships titles.

response: *Caroline Baird MBE (formally Innes), Paralympic athlete, is from Cupar.
